sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnprocessmonloginfo ( procs_id , procs_nm , procs_sttus , creat_dt , log_info , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #procsId# , #procsNm# , #procsSttus# , #creatDt# , #logInfo# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnprocessmonloginfo SET procs_id = #procsId# , procs_nm = #procsNm# , procs_sttus = #procsSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , log_info = #logInfo# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND procs_id = #procsId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnprocessmonloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND procs_id = #procsId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT procs_id , procs_nm , procs_sttus , creat_dt , log_info , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnprocessmonloginfo WHERE procs_id = #procsId# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT procs_id , procs_nm , procs_sttus , creat_dt , log_info , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnprocessmonloginfo WHERE 1=1
procs_id = #searchKeyword#
procs_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY procs_id DESC , log_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnprocessmonloginfo WHERE 1=1
procs_id = #searchKeyword#
procs_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
